data.name: SHOOTER LEAGUE - Sporti Alpha Vector
data.detailed_description:
This DLC unlocks the Sporti Alpha Vector, a NEW Gun for the game
Check The Gun In Game To See His Stats!
data.about_the_game:
This DLC unlocks the Sporti Alpha Vector, a NEW Gun for the game
Check The Gun In Game To See His Stats!
data.short_description: This dlc will unlock the Sporti Alpha Vector Gun!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 750 ti or better
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 970 or better
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
